name: 張桂綸
objective:
企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。
本課程將介紹：
1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理
2. 企業與客戶間的客戶倫理
3. 企業與同業間的競爭倫理
4. 企業與股東間的股東倫理
5. 企業與社會間的社會責任
6. 企業與政府間的政商倫理
Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 
1. Ethics between employer and employee
2. Ethics between enterprise and client
3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor
4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder
5. Ethics between enterprise and society
6. Ethics between enterprise and government
